summary:
Changes Intense flame perk to have a burn to ashes effect instead of fear
<br />Changes Disintegrate perk to paralyze muscles instead of disintegrate
<br />Change description of Deep Freeze to be freeze solid instead of paralyze
descriptionHtml:
-Not really necromancer friendly as it causes fire to destroy corpses.-

This mod came about because i do not like the fear effect on Intense Flames. So i tried to find a small mod that changes it but every other mod seems to try to overhaul every single aspect of every perk.

So i made minor changes to reasonably useless perks with descriptions that make sense to me.

I think it goes really well with Burn Freeze Shock Effects by pauderek
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14692/?

Change list:
Intense Flames - now burns enemies to ashes instead of fear
Paralyzing Shock(Disintegrate) - now paralyses enemies with shock instead of disintegrating them
Deep Freeze - freezes enemies solid

install
just an esp so put it in the '...Skyrimdata' folder
Skyrim.esm is the only master
Only edits the 3 perks mentioned above so should be very compatible

Changelog
v1.1
Renamed Disintegrate to Paralyzing Shock
v1.0
Initial release
author: the__mash
